snippet.title: Steam Game - Nightmares Mansion: Scary Dreams
snippet.description:
#scarygaming  #horrorgaming #horrorstories 

Add to your wishlist - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2879770/Nightmares_Mansion_Scary_Dreams/

Explore a scary mansion in the first-person puzzle horror game. Talk to kidnapped souls, collect grimoires, and discover the hidden secret inside the many doors. Your soul was stolen, and you found yourself in the underworld. Can you escape?
